Reviews.Title: Good Service
Reviews.Author: D'May Richardson
Reviews.Content: I will be ordering my next one in just a few weeks.  I got a Apple ibook G4.  I got if for myself, but ended up giving it to my 6 year old savant.  He loves it and will NOT let anyone touch it, that includes me.  I will be getting another one for my youngest.  I guess it depends on the parenting you have with your children to get them a product like this.  I love it and would tell others to shop with them.  Thank you  Desiree

Reviews.Title: I liked it
Reviews.Author: Laura Lamitie
Reviews.Content: I had no problems what so ever with the mac! My son however changed his mind and reverted back to windows. I would recommend it!!!

Reviews.Title: Top electronics.
Reviews.Author: marc samson
Reviews.Content: Apple is definitely my second favorite brand of computer, my first would be Alienware. I will be buying both of them very soon.

Reviews.Title: Not good in any way
Reviews.Author: charlie brown
Reviews.Content: It wouldn't down load my things or have any sound. I was very up set but I think it looks nice

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift, I just wish I knew the limitations on the machine before hand...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bruce
Reviews.Content: My son was thrilled to get this on Christmas morning it was one of the few things on his wish list... I wish I had paid attention to some of the other reviews off of amazon so I would have been fully aware of the limitations..... This was supposed to lighten the load on my laptop and instead any games or YouTube do not work... But he's able to use it for school which is what is Important... He just wanted to be able playing his games and videos on it as well...but it was quick shipping and the photos in the listing appear to be the actual one that was shipped to me. A pleasant transaction :)
